Sail to South-Eastern Asia

This item has been added to your Subscriptions. Some games will require you to relaunch them before the item will be downloaded.
Description
This is an campaign addon. Once you load it , you can find this campaign in your campaign menu. Its core is frigate sail, so you need to read my introduction document in addon directory.
This update solved some problems such as figure died accidently, task can't be completed properly etc. You need board ship and you'd better collecting your Yawl in your ship. Because maybe it's useful when you try to destroy enemy's ship. But you can let AI soldier sail your ship not only by yourself.
Credit:
CBATeam
Webknight
Delta Hawk
Jmax
Maxjoiner
POLPOX
